protein.general_function: Involved in Rho guanyl-nucleotide exchange factor activity
protein.specific_function: Acts as a guanine nucleotide exchange factor (GEF) which differentially activates the GTPases RHOA, RAC1 and CDC42. Plays a role in axon guidance regulating ephrin-induced growth cone collapse. Upon activation by ephrin through EPHA4, the GEF activity switches toward RHOA resulting in its activation. Activated RHOA promotes cone retraction at the expense of RAC1- and CDC42-stimulated growth cone extension

go_class.description: regulation of small gtpase mediated signal transduction
regulation of ras protein signal transduction
regulation of rho protein signal transduction
